titleStmt.title: A brief justification of the Prince of Orange's descent into England, and of the kingdoms late recourse to arms with a modest disquisition of what may become the wisdom and justice of the ensuing convention in their disposal of the crown.
titleStmt.author: Ferguson, Robert, d. 1714.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J.S. and sold by Richard Baldwin ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Robert Ferguson. Cf. BM.
Reel 67:14 listed erroneously on film as Wing F732, which should have spelling "sould" in imprint.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library and Duke University Library.
